CustomField.description: Formula based on ‘Total Number of Gifts’ (Customizable Rollup) and Number of Soft Credits’ (Customizable Rollup). Soft credit is defined by OCR = Funder - Soft Credit, DAF, Workplace Giving, Sponsor, Agency. Qualifying stages = Received, Received as Unconditional Pledge, Received as Conditional Pledge. All Opp Record Types except PG. Only the master field should be accessible to users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total count of all received Opportunities where the Contact has a hard or soft credit. (Planned Gifts not included).
CustomField.label: Lifetime Gift Count
